Manage and provide leadership for a team of 3 Sr. technology staff.Build and develop cross enterprise relationships leading to effective communication and collaboration between business units.Strengthen and maintain 3rd party vendor relationships, ensuring technology trend currency and improved client solution development.Manage technical projects by setting expectations, keeping parties informed, and by managing budgets, resources, and time.Provide high touch, personalized technical support for our Schwab senior executives at work, at home, or on the road.

Delegated tasks, managed customer/technical escalations, and set customer expectations.Provided training and mentoring for the Schwab Institutional support staffFunctioned as a liaison between the various business units within Schwab Institutional and Schwab Technology to support the current technology as well as make the technology understandable/useful for our business partners.Assisted with the design and rollout of a Schwab Institutional NT 4.0 image which led to a stable computing platform and also simplified the architecture by moving to platform and software standards.Managed the NT image with the business and the internal Change Management group.Gained server and account administration experience for both NT and Netware which allowed me to improve the support provided to our client base.Streamlined the infrastructure computing resources through the transition and retirement of our resource domain.Led the Schwab Institutional support team transition initiative consolidating the support into one consistent and cohesive team.
